lead_paragraph: John Diehl engaged in lengthy, innuendo-laden chat with a female intern, a freshman at Missouri Southern State University in Joplin.

headline.print_headline: Missouri House Speaker Quits Over Texts
headline.main: Missouri House Speaker Quits Over Texts

snippet: John Diehl engaged in lengthy, innuendo-laden chat with a female intern, a freshman at Missouri Southern State University in Joplin.
abstract: Missouri State House Speaker John Diehl announces his resignation after he was revealed to have exchanged sexually suggestive text messages with 19-year-old intern.
